data.title: Olga Ruf-Fiedler on LinkedIn: Dr. Jelle Zijlstra Award 2023 Laureate in the Field of Global Impact
data.meta_description: We are thrilled and honored to have received the Dr. Jelle Zijlstra Award 2023 in the field of Global Impact by Swiss Chamber of Commerce in The Netherlands‚Ä¶
data.text: üåü Introducing Olga Ruf-Fiedler, Founder of CatnClever and a participant in our FF+ Acceleration Program! üöÄ Dr. Olga Ruf-Fiedler brings a wealth of experience and a dynamic entrepreneurial spirit to her role as CEO and co-founder of CatnClever. With a background in applied mathematics and extensive experience in banking and investment, Olga's strong analytical foundation is complemented by her proven track record in developing innovative solutions. Her global experience spans across various regions, including Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and India, where she has demonstrated her ability to navigate diverse markets within the EdTech industry. She has an enduring track record of starting and building new businesses. As CEO she developed startups for established multinationals in the financial services industry. At CatnClever, Olga is committed to provide quality education for all children regardless of their backgrounds, and reduce the inequality in education between the countries. üåç Fluent in English, German, and Russian, Olga's multilingual skills facilitate global business development and partnerships, while her cultural extra-curricular engagement as President of a Swiss socio-cultural Theater Foundation and as a Board Member of a young Swiss Orchestra "United Soloists" from Lugano underscores her commitment to enriching the cultural and social fabric of the community. üöÄ In summary, Olga's diverse background, entrepreneurial mindset, international experience, leadership skills, and cultural engagement make her a standout CEO in the EdTech industry, poised to drive growth and success in the rapidly evolving field of educational technology. Learn more about our FF+ Acceleration Program and join the waiting list for the next batch to embark on your own entrepreneurial journey: https://lnkd.in/dg_aX_Hx STARTUP CAMPUS Switzerland Impact Hub Z√ºrich Vanessa Mohrig Merle Zur Marcela Durand Linda Aerne Annina Graf Matthias Filser Olga Ruf-Fiedler CatnClever #FemaleFounders #StartupAcceleration #CircularEconomy
